localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
blogPost.body: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
blogPost.title: ICONFi - Keep your savings simple with ICONFi.
blogPost.author: Molly Waldron

localize.description: ICONFi是一个数字资产储蓄平台。ICONFi可以让你赚取包括BTC、ETH、ICX和USDT在内的数字资产的利息，并提供一个简单的ICX押注解决方案。ICONFi以简单、安全的用户界面帮助你增加投资。
ICONFi是一個數字資產儲蓄平臺。ICONFi可以讓你賺取包括BTC、ETH、ICX和USDT在內的數字資產的利息，並提供一個簡單的ICX押注解決方案。ICONFi以簡單、安全的用戶界面幫助你增加投資。

previous.excerpt: Ponder guides you through daily journaling right from your new tab. With self-reflective prompts, fast keyboard shortcuts, aesthetic backgrounds, and privately-stored entries, you can just focus on writing — Ponder takes care of the rest.
previous.title: Ponder - Daily journal from your new tab

localize.description: Ponder引导你在新的标签页上完成每日日记。有了自我反思的提示、快速键盘快捷键、美学背景和私人存储的条目，你只需专注于写作--Ponder 会处理剩下的事情。

next.title:
It took Google 8 years to hit $10 billion in sales, the fastest ever for a U.S. startup. 

5 EV companies think they're going to do it faster. 

I'll take the way over on this one. 

https://t.co/9Ji7OF1VRh https://t.co/nBMHU6xCPK

localize.full_text:
谷歌花了8年时间才达到100亿美元的销售额，是美国创业公司有史以来最快的。

5家电动车公司认为他们会做得更快。

这一点上，我倒是很赞同。

https://t.co/9Ji7OF1VRh https://t.co/nBMHU6xCPK

谷歌花了8年時間才達到100億美元的銷售額，是美國創業公司有史以來最快的。

5家電動車公司認爲他們會做得更快。

這一點上，我倒是很贊同。

https://t.co/9Ji7OF1VRh https://t.co/nBMHU6xCPK
